name: KeepEmLivin'
description:
You can only Heal. 
Defend yourself and others by healing against waves of demonic foes.

Please Enter Full Screen Mode for the best experience.
Controls:
E - a strong mana efficent single target heal.
R - A channeled heal that heals a target and a friend for a small amount each second.
H- Drag an ally to a different postion, or two swap allies this will allow you to move back the injured instead of risk losing them while healing.
T - Restarts the game when you get an game over.
